name: AWS IoT Things
short: A service in AWS that allows you to connect and manage devices, and interact with cloud applications.
description: AWS IoT Things represents a device or a logical entity for IoT applications in AWS IoT. Each 'thing' is a representation of a specific device or logical entity, which can be anything from a light bulb to a complex machine. It has a unique identifier and can be organized into groups for easy management. It also includes a shadow - a JSON document used to store and retrieve current state information. This service is crucial in connecting and managing IoT devices and enabling real-time applications.
